S

search(TourSearchDTO, Long) - Method in class com.what2see.controller.tour.TourController
Get all tours that match all specified criteria.
For tags, it is sufficient that at least one is present.
For maximum duration, it is sufficient that it is lower or equal.
search(User, TourSearchDTO) - Method in class com.what2see.service.tour.TourService
Searches for tours according to the specified search criteria (all optional) and based on the requesting User.
In particular, the user role is used to determine the most appropriate search strategy to be used.
searchAll(City, Theme, String) - Method in interface com.what2see.repository.tour.TourRepository
Searches for tours without considering their visibility status.
It is intended to only be used by administrators.
searchPublicOrCreatedBy(City, Theme, String, Guide) - Method in interface com.what2see.repository.tour.TourRepository
Searches for tours that are public or created by the given guide.
searchPublicOrSharedWith(City, Theme, String, Tourist) - Method in interface com.what2see.repository.tour.TourRepository
Searches for tours that are public or shared with the given tourist.
searchWithStrategy(User, City, Theme, String, List<Tag>) - Method in class com.what2see.service.tour.search.TourSearch
Searches and sorts tours based on the generic strategy set as field.
sendMessage - Variable in class com.what2see.dto.tour.TourActionsResponseDTO
 
sendMessage(MessageCreateDTO, Long) - Method in class com.what2see.controller.user.ConversationController
Send a message in an existing conversation.
It is intended to only be used by one of the conversation participants (tourist or guide).
Note that Message.direction boolean is automatically set, based on the requesting user role.
sendMessage(Message) - Method in class com.what2see.service.user.MessageService
Creates a new Message entity.
ServletInitializer - Class in com.what2see
Servlet initializer class for the Spring Boot application.
ServletInitializer() - Constructor for class com.what2see.ServletInitializer

sharedTouristIds - Variable in class com.what2see.dto.tour.TourCreateDTO
 
sharedTourists - Variable in class com.what2see.model.tour.Tour
 
sharedTours - Variable in class com.what2see.model.user.Tourist
 
stars - Variable in class com.what2see.dto.tour.ReviewCreateDTO
 
stars - Variable in class com.what2see.dto.tour.ReviewResponseDTO
 
stars - Variable in class com.what2see.model.tour.Review
 
startConversation(ConversationCreateDTO, Long) - Method in class com.what2see.controller.user.ConversationController
Start a new conversation with a guide.
It is intended to only be used by tourists and only if the conversation has not been already started.
startConversation(Conversation) - Method in class com.what2see.service.user.ConversationService
Create a new Conversation entity with one or more messages from tourist to guide.
Note that doesn't throw error if conversation is started with multiple messages or from guide to tourist.
Stop - Class in com.what2see.model.tour
Entity that represents a tour stop in the database.
Usually is used as a part of a tour.
Stop() - Constructor for class com.what2see.model.tour.Stop
 
StopCreateDTO - Class in com.what2see.dto.tour
Implementation of DTO pattern for creating stops in the incoming body.
Usually is used as a part of a tour creation request.
StopCreateDTO() - Constructor for class com.what2see.dto.tour.StopCreateDTO
 
StopDTOMapper - Class in com.what2see.mapper.tour
Service that converts Stop entities from and to DTOs.
Is usually used in controller to communicate with client side.
StopDTOMapper() - Constructor for class com.what2see.mapper.tour.StopDTOMapper
 
stopMapper - Variable in class com.what2see.mapper.tour.TourDTOMapper
 
StopResponseDTO - Class in com.what2see.dto.tour
Implementation of DTO pattern for returning stops in the outgoing body.
Usually is used as a part of a tour response.
StopResponseDTO() - Constructor for class com.what2see.dto.tour.StopResponseDTO
